name: Bane of Asphodel
description: Bane of Asphodel is an Action-Adventure Game set in the mystical world of Asphodel. Players can play as Neith, a recently deceased normal person, and must liberate the land from the evil Keeper of the Cycle.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 800 MB available space
